Here is a list of articles in ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'' that contain previously unpublished materials by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. ==Articles== * [[Vinyar Tengwar 50|Issue 50]], March 2013 ** "The 'Túrin Wrapper'" — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Carl F. Hostetter * [[Vinyar Tengwar 49|Issue 49]], June 2007 ** "''Eldarin Hands, Fingers & Numerals'' and Related Writings, Part three" — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Patrick H. Wynne ** "Five Late Quenya Volitive Inscriptions" — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Carl F. Hostetter * [[Vinyar Tengwar 48|Issue 48]], December 2005 ** "''Eldarin Hands, Fingers & Numerals'' and Related Writings, Part two" — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Patrick H. Wynne * [[Vinyar Tengwar 47|Issue 47]], February 2005 ** "''Eldarin Hands, Fingers & Numerals'' and Related Writings, Part one" — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Patrick H. Wynne * [[Vinyar Tengwar 46|Issue 46]], July 2004 ** "Addenda and Corrigenda to the ''[[Etymologies]]'', Part two" — eds. Carl F. Hostetter and Patrick H. Wynne
with an appendix on the ''tengwar'' of the ''Etymologies'' by Arden R. Smith * [[Vinyar Tengwar 45|Issue 45]], November 2003 ** "Addenda and Corrigenda to the ''[[Etymologies]]'', Part one" — eds. Carl F. Hostetter and Patrick H. Wynne * [[Vinyar Tengwar 44|Issue 44]], June 2002 ** "'Words of Joy': Five Catholic Prayers in Quenya, Part two" — J.R.R. Tolkien, eds. Patrick H. Wynne, Arden R. Smith, and Carl F. Hostetter *** 4. ''[[Ortírielyanna]] (Sub Tuum Praesidium)'' *** 5. [[The Litany of Loreto]] ** "''[[Ae Adar Nín]]'': The Lord's Prayer in Sindarin" — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Bill Welden ** "''[[Alcar mi Tarmenel na Erun]]'': The ''Gloria in Exclesis Deo'' in Quenya" — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Arden R. Hostetter *** 1. ''[[Átaremma]] (Pater Noster)'' *** 2. ''[[Aia María]] (Ave Maria)'' *** 3.
